title: Reporting a player for harrassment out of game.
body: I was recently added after game by somebody, and decided to accept even though they were toxic in game, they proceeded to use chinese and english to say some things that were extremely toxic, but i wasnt too bothered. I would like to report this player to riot, but the support section of the website does not allow for this. i have a screencap of the messages they sent to me as well.

replies.body:
If you have screenshots of someone being toxic outside of the game, you can them directly to Riot via a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

If you are unsure which category to use, you can use [I have a question about League of Legends/Riot Games.] > [Game and Features] > [General Questions] and it will be directed to the correct department.

As *Zombiemaster* mentioned, sending the screenshots attached to a support ticket are the best option here. Did you report them in the post-game lobby as well? That's always a good move if they were toxic in-game to you or others in the game.

I'd recommend not accepting invites from players who were toxic in the previous match, as they are unlikely to suddenly turn a new leaf. Let me know if you have any questions.
